nodes.bodyText:
I'm really not sure about this change. Why not returning always the RegexTree and use the other methods parseRegex(String regex) when we need to test the flags.
When I look at all the tests which have been changed to call getResult() just after, I feel it reduced the readability of the test.

This one is actually not used. Do you need it for a coming rule?
If it's not the case I would simply drop it for the time being (less is more).
